about_the_game:
[Exercise with VR]
This application supports your daily exercise.

The instructors will support your exercise!
Exercise records are saved and can be checked!

The content includes sit-ups, push-ups, squats, and boxercise!

[Rich in customizable elements]

- Instructors: Customize your instructor to support your exercises!

- Modes: Time Attack, Count, Endless, and more!

- BGM, Background: Change the background music and background while exercising!


[Complete badges and hidden elements!]
Earn badges by completing missions!
You can also unlock hidden elements depending on your exercise progress!

Some of the hidden elements can be earned by solving riddles...?

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains women in somewhat revealing clothing.
It does NOT contain any sex, violence, drugs, or self-harm.

detailed_description:
[Exercise with VR]
This application supports your daily exercise.

The instructors will support your exercise!
Exercise records are saved and can be checked!

The content includes sit-ups, push-ups, squats, and boxercise!

[Rich in customizable elements]

- Instructors: Customize your instructor to support your exercises!

- Modes: Time Attack, Count, Endless, and more!

- BGM, Background: Change the background music and background while exercising!


[Complete badges and hidden elements!]
Earn badges by completing missions!
You can also unlock hidden elements depending on your exercise progress!

Some of the hidden elements can be earned by solving riddles...?
name: VR Fitness Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Easy fitness in VR! A wealth of customisable elements to keep you going! Complete badges and hidden elements as you exercise!
